generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with white lane markings, which is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area next to the road, separated by a curb, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, fitting the definition of building.
- pole: A vertical pole with signs attached is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign and a directional sign are mounted on the pole on the right.
- vegetation: A tree is visible in the distance down the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, showing a partly cloudy sky.
- person: Three individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, and a car is visible in the foreground.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance down the street.
